meanings.sent1: They pilgrimed to the holy city to pray.
meanings.sent2: She pilgrimed to the ancient temple to seek blessings.
meanings.sent3: The family pilgrimed together, singing songs along the way.
meanings.sent4: The old man pilgrimed to the mountain peak, seeking wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The group pilgrimed through the forest, guided by the stars above.

meanings.sent1: The pilgrimed travelers shared stories of their journey.
meanings.sent2: The pilgrimed pilgrims returned home with newfound faith.
meanings.sent3: The pilgrimed group celebrated their safe return with a feast.
meanings.sent4: The pilgrimed shrine stood as a testament to their devotion.
meanings.sent5: The pilgrimed path was marked by colorful flags fluttering in the wind.
